problem.markdown:
Quiz Points
Q1. Enter the points with brackets and a comman between. Ex. (5, -3)
( ) Point A ( ) Point B ( ) Point C ( ) Point D ( ) Point E
Q2. What is the point whose distance from XY plane is 3, YZ plane is -4 and XZ plane is 9 ? ( ) (3, 0, -4) ( ) (-4, 3, 9) ( ) (-4, 9, 3) ( ) (-4, 9, 9)
Q3. Convert the coordinate (12, 24, 42, 6) from homogeneous form to ordinary cartesian coordinates. ( ) (4, 2, 7) ( ) (7, 2, 4) ( ) (2, 4, 7) ( ) (2, 4, 4)
problem.p: Q1. Enter the points with brackets and a comman between. Ex. (5, -3)
Q2. What is the point whose distance from XY plane is 3, YZ plane is -4 and XZ plane is 9 ?
Q3. Convert the coordinate (12, 24, 42, 6) from homogeneous form to ordinary cartesian coordinates.
